mapper.select: SELECT q.quest_id AS questId, q.title, q.description, q.reward, q.capacity, TO_CHAR(q.deadline, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS deadline, CASE WHEN q.deadline < SYSDATE THEN 4 -- 마감일이 현재 날짜를 지난 경우: 4 WHEN mq.endYN = 'Y' THEN 3 -- 퀘스트 완료: 3 WHEN mq.selectedYN = 'Y' THEN 2 -- 퀘스트 수락: 2 WHEN mq.endYN IS NULL THEN 0 -- 레코드가 없는 경우: 0 ELSE 1 -- 수락 대기 중: 1 END AS status FROM quest q LEFT JOIN member_quest mq ON q.quest_id = mq.quest_id AND mq.member_id = #{memberId} WHERE q.town_id = #{townId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_quest (member_quest_id, member_id, quest_id, selectedYN, endYN) VALUES (MEMBER_QUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{questId}, 'N', 'N')

INSERT INTO QUEST (QUEST_ID, town_id, title, description, reward, capacity, deadline) VALUES (QUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{townId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{reward}, #{capacity}, TO_DATE(#{deadline}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
